title: Szabolcs Varga
text:
Szabolcs Varga (born 17 March 1995) is a <a href="Hungary">Hungarian</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player who currently plays for Hungarian side <a href="Szeged-Csan%C3%A1d%20Grosics%20Akad%C3%A9mia">Szeged-Csanád Grosics Akadémia</a>.
Career.
MTK Budapest.
He started his adult career in <a href="MTK%20Budapest%20FC">MTK Budapest FC</a>. He debuted in the <a href="Hungarian%20League">Hungarian League</a> in the 2012-13 season.
Heerenveen.
On 3 January 2014, Varga was signed by <a href="Eredivisie">Eredivisie</a> club <a href="Heerenveen%20S.C.">Heerenveen S.C.</a>.
International career.
He was also part of the Hungarian U-19 at the <a href="2014%20UEFA%20European%20Under-19%20Championship">2014 UEFA European Under-19 Championship</a>.
Club statistics.
"Updated to games played as of 1 December 2013."
